divs: sighting detailsmy name is rudy, i would like to report a triangular\ delta ufo i was driving from nc fayetteville to daytona beach fl, and about 10:00 pm july 28, 2008 , i was 17 miles north of jacksonville fl. on highway i-95, when i saw this strange flying object hovering over the highway, i was driving about 70 mph when i saw this object hovering on the highway at first moment i though that it was a helicopter giving tickets from the air , so i reduced the speed at to 60 mph, (300 feet horizontal distance and about 50 to 80 feet vertical altitude ) but when i got closer to the object then i realized that it was not a helicopter (at that moment i was about 70 feet horizontal distance and 50 feet to 80 feet vertical altitude) then the ufo starting to move to my left side (90 degrees from driver seat) at the point i was thinking that it was a small airplane because i did not set the rotors but the object was moving to slow, about 10 mph, and did not have beacon lights, nor red or green lights like airplanes , it did not have the shape of an airplane nor the sound, it was silence because i rolled down my window and i heard only the engine of my car , it had triangular delta shape 3 white lights one in each corner of the triangle shape(underneath), color was metallic gray the borders were rounded and it appear to have like layers of metal , object size about 35 feet long , the lights were about 30 inches . when i noticed and realized that was not an airplane nor helicopter i pulled over the side of the highway and i got out of my car at this moment the object it was about 300 feet and at the same altitude but about my 6 o'clock and them it when over the trees about my 5 o'clock and it disappeared between the trees. this happened within 2 a 3 minutes time frame, after i arrived to daytona beach and told my friend what happened and i described and him the object , after that we went to the internet looking for ufo shapes and we founded the shape. i am pilot with ( 190 hours) private pilot licenses and working with on my instrument rating and i pretty much i can distinguish airplanes and ularhelicopters at night and i had been in service (us army) for more than 8 years and i had never seen something like that in my life (military nor civilian aviation) i always believed that extraterrestrial life existed but i had never i was so close to see one ........rudy
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
